Methods

addEvents

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:601

Adds event listeners with jQuery.

createEvents

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:487

Creates event related methods

destroy

() chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:873

Destroys nanoScroller and restores browser's native scrollbar.

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ destroy: true });

flash

() chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:902

To flash the scrollbar gadget for an amount of time defined in plugin settings (defaults to 1,5s). Useful if you want to show the user (e.g. on pageload) that there is more content waiting for him.

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ flash: true });

generate

() private chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:640

Generates nanoScroller's scrollbar and elements for it.

getBrowserScrollbarWidth

() Number private static

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:317

Returns browser's native scrollbar width

Returns:

Number:

the scrollbar width in pixels

nativeScrolling

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:410

Enable iOS native scrolling

preventScrolling

(
  • event
  • direction
)
private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:382

Prevents the rest of the page being scrolled when user scrolls the .nano-content element.

Parameters:

  • event Event
  • direction String

    Scroll direction (up or down)

removeEvents

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:622

Removes event listeners with jQuery.

reset

() chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:689

Resets nanoScroller's scrollbar.

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller();

restore

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:675

scroll

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:772

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ scroll: 'top' });

scrollBottom

(
  • offsetY
)
chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:794

Scroll at the bottom with an offset value

Parameters:

  • offsetY Number

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ scrollBottom: value });

scrollTo

(
  • node
)
chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:832

Scroll to an element

Parameters:

  • node Node

    A node to scroll to.

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ scrollTo: $('#a_node') });

scrollTop

(
  • offsetY
)
chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:813

Scroll at the top with an offset value

Parameters:

  • offsetY Number

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ scrollTop: value });

setOnScrollStyles

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:454

Updates CSS styles for current scroll position. Uses CSS 2d transfroms and window.requestAnimationFrame if available.

stop

() chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:850

To stop the operation. This option will tell the plugin to disable all event bindings and hide the gadget scrollbar from the UI.

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ stop: true });

updateScrollValues

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:425

Updates those nanoScroller properties that are related to current scrollbar position.

Boolean

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:66
